name: Hot Rotato
description:
Hot Rotato is an action-packed platformer game created at SD Hacks 2017.  Race against the clock in 5 distinct levels, each more difficult and hectic than the last.  Mesmerizing aesthetics can distract from the task at hand - stay focused and stay above the platform!  

The key to triumphing through the chaos is understanding the platform's core mechanics: your source of survival orbits you rapidly.
